programme.desc: No Velho Oeste Bill Tyler, um comerciante de peles, tenta achar com seu melhor amigo, Henry Frapp, o lendário vale conhecido pela enorme quantidade de animais para caçar.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: O Grande Búfalo Branco, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1874 Wild Bill Hickok vai para o Velho Oeste, usando o nome de James Otis, pois precisa caçar um búfalo branco que sempre lhe provoca estranhos pesadelos.

programme.title: Arizona Violento, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Quando John Stewart dá refúgio à namorada de Wick Campbell, Campbell se volta contra ele.

programme.title: O Pequeno Grande Homem, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: A história do Velho-Oeste contada através dos olhos de Jack Crabb, sequestrado pelos índios quando criança e que acabou vivendo dos dois lados: homens brancos e "seres humanos", como os índios chamavam a si mesmos.

programme.title: Santo Antonio: Cidade sem Lei, (1946, Western)
programme.desc: 1877, sudoeste do Texas. Milhares de cabeças de gado eram empurradas para o norte do estado, sem que haja controle algum.

programme.title: Keoma, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Ao final da Guerra Civil Americana, um pistoleiro mestiço, cansado de fazer da morte um meio de vida, retorna para aquilo que um dia costumava ser seu lar.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Projeto Pé Grande, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: Um grupo de cineastas amadores decide embarcar em uma jornada nas florestas da Geórgia à procura do misterioso Pé Grande.

programme.title: 100 Dias de Resistencia, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Zilan, uma jovem, retorna à sua cidade natal em busca dos vestígios de seu irmão morto, assassinado pelo Estado Islâmico.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Mar Negro, (2013, Monsters)
programme.desc: Uma estranha contaminação atinge uma pequena vila de pescadores. Quando peixes e crustáceos se transformam em horrendas criaturas transmissoras de morte e destruição.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: American Poltergeist - Possuídos, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Ted e Lauren alugam uma velha casa no campo, de um homem chamado Jim, para trabalhar em seu estudo. À medida que o tempo passa, o casal se torna cada vez mais desconfiado dos acontecimentos e do estranho comportamento de seu anfitrião.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.title: Uma mulher misteriosa aparece diante de Sesshomaru. Sara foi trazida de volta à vida e roubou a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e transformou Mirok e Sango em estátuas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.title: Mushin, a pessoa que criou Mirok, vai morrer. Eles perguntam a Mushin o que ele quer para que eles possam lhe dar um último presente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um ancestral de Hojo está em uma jornada para oferecer a herança da família Hojo, uma espada demoníaca. Inuyasha e seu grupo o acompanham.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Nome do Ancestral é Agome

programme.title: A lâmina de Ken traz desastre e Akitoki e Inuyasha viajam para o santuário para selar os poderes demoníacos da lâmina.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sobrevivente em uma Terra Infestada por Youkais

programme.title: Hoshiyomi usa a lâmina Ken para roubar os poderes demoníacos da Tessaiga. Ele captura Agome e diz a Inuyasha para ir ao santuário dos deuses do vento e do trovão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Grande Duelo na Cascata Shoun

programme.title: Tsukiyomi, que deveria estar morto, possui Agome e aparece diante de Hoshiyomi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak está trazendo sacerdotes virtuosos perto da morte e perscrutando suas mentes. Ele está tentando investigar o local que liga os mundos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak foi dividido em dois. Metade volta à vida na forma de uma criança vestida de branco.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kanta é uma criança youkai lontra. A cabeça de seu pai foi tomada por Hakudoshi e ele procura o corpo de seu pai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Viagem em Busca do Pai

programme.title: O local entre este mundo e o próximo, onde está o fragmento da Jóia, é o cemitério do pai de Inuyasha .
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em Nome do Rei: A Última Missão, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um assassino moderno, é contratado para uma tarefa final: sequestrar as filhas de uma Família real européia. As coisas vão à loucura quando descobrimos que ele escolheu voltar à Idade Média e trazer de volta a ordem a um reino no caos.

programme.title: A jornada mágica de Emily, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Depois da morte de seu pai, a pequena Emily tenta ajudar sua mãe a reencontrar a felicidade e aprender sobre o pai que nunca conheceu.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um garoto bem-humorado descobre um par de calças mágicas que podem tirar uma quantidade infinita de notas dos bolsos. Ele logo é perseguido por forças poderosas que não querem nada mais do que controlar o fluxo de dinheiro.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)

programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji's explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision, to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!

programme.title: The Straw Hats put Jimbei's plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!

programme.title: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege's team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege's Allied Forces!

programme.title: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!

programme.title: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!

programme.title: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding's beauty prove too enchanting?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!

programme.title: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding's grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!

programme.title: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!

programme.title: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can't even bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!

programme.title: The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister, and Big Mom loses her wits!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!

programme.title: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!

programme.title: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats' plan goes awry, and all hope looks to be lost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Launcher Blasts! The Moment of Big Mom's Assassination!

programme.title: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom's troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege's stronghold - with the full force of the Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, it's only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!

programme.title: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom's castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can't resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile, the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Escape From the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Execution Begins! Luffy's Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!

programme.title: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape, which involves some parting of ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle Collapses! The Straw Hat’s Great Escape Begins!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!

programme.title: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom's word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!

programme.title: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn't stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses, and Pudding's changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!

programme.title: Mama's onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero's mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!

programme.title: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny's Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!

programme.title: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom's naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure

programme.title: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro's sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm, which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!

programme.title: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!

programme.title: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous – but little do they know the plan is overheard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy’s Silent Fight!

programme.title: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!

programme.title: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile, at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away… and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award® Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award® Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru tries to avoid Chibi-Usa out of fear that her other personality will bring harm. Undaunted, Chibi-Usa invites Hotaru to go on a picnic.
programme.sub-title: Sunny Skies After a Storm: A Friendship Dedicated to Hotaru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shun Hayase is a high school athlete who sets a new national record in the men's high jump after overcoming health issues as a child.
programme.sub-title: Higher and Stronger: A Cheer from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A freak accident caused by Mimete results in Hotaru's house getting pulled into a dimensional rift, with Hotaru and Chibi-Usa trapped inside.
programme.sub-title: Battle Inside the Demonic Space: The Sailor Guardians' Gamble

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete attacks with Daimon u Choten.
programme.sub-title: The Messiah of Silence Awakens? Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends sneak into Mugen Academy in search of Hotaru, who has gone missing.
programme.sub-title: An Invasion from Another Dimension: Mystery of Mugen Academy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new variety of flower called Tellun is being sold at a flower shop in the Juban District.
programme.sub-title: A Bewitching Flower That Steals Hearts: Tellu, the Third Witch

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the others sneak into the practice examination site of the Mugen Academy. They meet Yui Bido who takes an interest in Ami's intelligence.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Cyprine manages to steal pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa's power and kidnaps her!
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The revived Mistress 9 attempts to call Pharaoh 90, an energy life-form from another dimension, to Earth.
programme.sub-title: The Coming Terror of Darkness: Struggle of the Eight Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru’s and Mistress 9’s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe to save Hotaru’s heart.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Shooting Star: Saturn and the Messiah

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following the fight with Pharaoh 90, Usagi and her friends search for Hotaru in the ruins of Mugen Academy.

programme.desc: Bill, Alex, and Mike discuss the latest hot topics in the news.

programme.title: FOX SOUL Faceoff
programme.desc: FOX SOUL Faceoff talks about those hot topic issues a lot of us are afraid to talk about!

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: Exploring provocative topics with an open mind and a cocktail in hand.

programme.title: The Security Guard
programme.desc: Omari Russell, a single father and School Safety Officer, confronts a school shooting to protect his daughter.

programme.title: FOX SOUL Faceoff
programme.desc: FOX SOUL Faceoff talks about those hot topic issues a lot of us are afraid to talk about!

programme.title: Street Soldiers With Lisa Evers
programme.desc: Lisa Evers of Fox 5 and Hot 97 discusses music, culture, race, gender, crime, education, and more.

programme.title: CriticLee Speaking
programme.desc: Movie Review and Preview Entertainment Program.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.
